law.catch_line: Referendum to be supervised by Commissioner.
law.text: The manner, conduct, and management of any referendum held under the provisions of KRS 247.4451 to 247.4483 shall be under the supervision and direction of the Commissioner of Agriculture, and any and all expenses in connection therewith shall be borne by the commission, council, board, or other agency certified in accordance with the provisions of KRS 247.4451 to 247.4483.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.lrc-note: (9/24/96). References in this statute to the range created by 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 167 were incorrectly codified as "KRS 247.4451 to 247.4453." Under KRS 7.136(1)(f), these references have been changed to read "KRS 247.4451 to 247.4483."
